name: Descendant combination
description:
The **descendant combination selector** selects every element with the type of e.g. `F` which has as parent an element with the element type of `E`.
[info]CSS4 introduced a new, non-whitespace version of the [`descendant combination selector`](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css4/descendant-combination/ 'CSS4: Descendant Combination').[/info]
example_description: This example will add a green `background-color` with a white `color` to every `<span>` which has a `<div>` as parent.
